colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI LHA SRIN SDE BRGYAD KYI BSANGS MCHOD 'BUL BAR BGYIS PA'I PHAN YON CHE BAS, HAL HA'I GNAS SU SA BDAG KHRO BO DRAG P RKYEN BYAS PAS SA BDAG KLU NYIN GYI RNAMS SNA TSOGS MI PHYUGS SOGS LA NAD YAMS DAL YAMS GOD KHA DANG SPYANG KHU CHOM RKUN DGRA LDANG 'CHI 'KHRUGS RE RE GSOD DANG SDUG BSNGAL SHIN TU CHES PA'I CHED DU GUNG MI 'GYUR RDO RJE SHOG BLO BZANG YON DAN GYIS SKUL NGOR, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSOS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BLO BZANG DAM DPAL LO, ,)
